vamartid.test1._email

Class JmailHelp

  • java.lang.Object
    • vamartid.test1._email.JmailHelp

  • public class JmailHelp
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class JmailHelp is very important class witch gives the server Power to checks files and txt in order to save,and edit data of the user's and their emails

      JmailHelp()
      This is constructor of JmailHelp object needed to change the directory to the right one

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String username1,
                     java.lang.String code1,
                     java.lang.String first1,
                     java.lang.String last1,
                     java.lang.String birthday1,
                     java.lang.String currentmail1)
        This method register adds a next raw to the txt with the data of the users using the above parameters
        Parameters:
        username1 - is the username
        code1 - is the password
        first1 - is the first name
        last1 - is the last name
        birthday1 - is the birthday
        currentmail1 - is the current email address

      • login_compare

        public int login_compare(java.lang.String u,
                         java.lang.String p)
        This method login_compare takes the 2 important fields and check's if they exist in the login data and returns the value of result.If a user is not log in it writes him as logged in and alow him to log in.
        Parameters:
        u - username
        p - password
        Returns:
        returns 0 if it does not exist,1 if it exist and not logged in then allow to log in,2 if it exist and it is logged in already

      • find_the_mails

        public java.io.File[] find_the_mails(java.lang.String dirName)
        This method find_the_mails find all email's of the directory witch is given
        Parameters:
        dirName - name of the user's directory
        Returns:
        a File[] array with all the data of the user (emails)

      • read_mail

        public Email read_mail(java.io.File a,
                       boolean asd)
        This method read_mail creates an Email object from the txt email file we give and returns it to the server in order to be sent to the client If the asd is false it does not declare it as read(by changing value of isNew(don't forget it can always be false if it was read before)) if it is false it does
        Parameters:
        a - the file of the email we need to read (change read value)
        asd - the boolean witch declares if the receiver read it or just sent the Email object to the receiver
        Returns:
        the Email object

      • checkUsername

        public boolean checkUsername(java.lang.String username)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method checkUsername checks if a username exist Server use that method to see if a username of the receiver exist When someone sends a new mail
        Parameters:
        username - user's username
        Returns:
        true if the username exist false if not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong with the streams
